name: Scheduled database maintenance [DOWNTIME REQUIRED]
content:
We're going to upgrade our databases with a follower changeover strategy.

During this period of time the Content Management API, Content Delivery API and projects administrative interface will be completely unavailable.

Cached GraphQL requests in our CDN will continue to work.

The actual maintenance impact should be contained to 60 minutes starting from 2023-04-29T13:00:00Z (UTC).

updates.content:
Maintenance started.

During this period of time the Content Management API, Content Delivery API and projects administrative interface will be completely unavailable.

Cached GraphQL requests in our CDN will continue to work.
Everything is OK at the moment.
